eg.utils

Class Dialogs

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.utils.Dialogs

  • public class Dialogs
extends java.lang.Object
    Static methods to show dialogs using JOptionPane

        public static int confirmYesNoCancel(java.lang.String message)
        Shows a confirmation dialog with Yes, No and Cancel options
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the Yes, No or Cancel option specified in JOptionPane

      • comboBoxOpt

        public static java.lang.String comboBoxOpt(java.lang.String message,
                                           java.lang.String title,
                                           java.lang.String[] options,
                                           java.lang.String preselected,
                                           boolean isWarning)
        Shows a dialog with options selectable in a JComboBox
        Parameters:
        message - the message for the dialog
        title - the title for the dialog
        options - the array of options that are selectable
        preselected - the option that is preselected. Can be Null
        isWarning - true to show a warning icon, false to show no icon
        Returns:
        the element selected from options if ok is clicked, null otherwise

      • textFieldInput

        public static java.lang.String textFieldInput(java.lang.String message,
                                              java.lang.String title,
                                              java.lang.String initText)
        Shows a dialog with the option to enter text in a text field
        Parameters:
        message - the message for the dialog
        title - the title for the dialog
        initText - the text that is initially shown in the text field
        Returns:
        the string entered in the text field if ok is clicked, null otherwise
